item.title: kate add a quote by J.R. "Bob" Dobbs
item.description: "Fuck em if they can't take a joke" -- J.R. "Bob" Dobbs

item.title: kate add a quote by Daniel Johnston
item.description: "I never met a girl I didn't meet" -- Daniel Johnston

item.title: kate add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Work is love made visible." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: kate add a quote by Kate Bornstein
item.description: "I have this idea that every time we discover that the names we're being called are somehow keeping us less than free, we need to come up with new names for ourselves, and that the names we give ourselves must no longer reflect a fear of being labeled outsiders, must no longer bind us to a system that would rather see us dead." -- Kate Bornstein

item.title: kate add a quote by Alan Watts
item.description: "Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth." -- Alan Watts

item.title: kate add a quote by Robert Anton Wilson
item.description: "The future is up for grabs. It belongs to any and all who will take the risk and accept the responsibility of consciously creating the future they want." -- Robert Anton Wilson

item.title: kate add a quote by Will Self
item.description: "I'm going to end up like one of those old weirdos who lives in a network of tunnels burrowed through trash - yet I do not fear this." -- Will Self

item.title: kate add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "What a marvelous cooperative arrangement - plants and animals each inhaling each other's exhalations, a kind of planet-wide mutual mouth-to-stoma resuscitation, the entire elegant cycle powered by a star 150 million kilometers away." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: kate add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "If you wish to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first invent the universe." -- Carl Sagan
